## TermStats interface

Simplified stats for a term in a terms facet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TermStats extends RawTermStats 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [selected](./doofinder.termstats.selected.md) | boolean | If the term was selected or not when filtering. |
